attributes.action: PETITION "" Allow Nigel Farage to be part of the BBC Debate on 21st June 2016.
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farage has the right to be on the BBC great Brexit debate on 21st June 2016.
attributes.background: Nigel Farage has been the Leader of the Brexit Campaign for 20 years " without Nigel Farage & his 4 million supporters we wouldn't be having an E.U. In/Out referendum.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It would be up to television companies to arrange a debate and to invite people to attend. The BBC is operationally and editorially independent of the Government and Parliament.
